pages.text: Welcome to Mendelcraft, the Minecraft based educational game where you learn about genetics. But what exactly is that? Genetics or heredity studies started with the scientist Gregor Mendel who is the founder of genetics as we know it today.
Through his experiments with plants, he discovered how the plants owe their color and shape to the 'parents' of the plant. In Mendelcraft we continue his research using chickens.
